Blossom Chukwujekwu bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke Naịjirịa, onye mere ihe ngosi ọkachamara izizi ya n'afọ 2009
Na 2015, o meriri ihe nrite onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma  na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards

A mụrụ  ma kpọọ ya Chukwudi Echezona Chukwujekwu n'abalị anọ nke ọnwa Novemba , 1983 na Benin City, Edo State, Nigeria  nye Dr I.E na Evangelist JC Chukwujekwu, Blossom Chukwujekwu  bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Ọ bụ onye Otolo, Nnewi North na Anambra State, Southeast Nigeria
Ọ gara Greater Tomorrow Primary School na Greater Tomorrow Comprehensive College bụcha na Benin City, Edo State
Maka agụmakwụkwọ mahadum ya, Blossom họọrọ ịgụ Mass Communications na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Anambra steeti
ebe ọ nọrọ otu afọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Benson Idahosa University,  Benin City, Edo State ka ọ gbachara obere oge na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Enugu State
Mgbe ọ nọ na BIU, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Association of Mass Communication Students (AMCOS) n'afọ agụmakwụkwọ nke 2007/2008
Ọ bụkwa onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Ụlọ ihe nkiri a ma ama (H.O.T) ebe ọ bụla onye ndu na ihe nkiri ọgbọ bụ Godless: The path to dawn
Blossom na-ekwusi ike na ịgosiputa ka  Ukemu na Godless bụ oge eureka ya
Na Julaị 2008 ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na Mass Communications na Mahadum Benson Idahosa, Benin City, Edo State
Ọ kwagara Legọs, Nigeria ọnwa ole na ole ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ iji rụọ ọrụ ọrụ ndị ntorobịa nke mba
Blossom nọrọ na Legọs ka ọ gbasoo ebumnobi ya ime ihe omume.
N'afọ 2009, ka emechara ọtụtụ nyocha, Chukwujekwu  wetara ọkwa isi n'ime ihe nkiri soap opera nke Naijiria aka ga ewepụta; bụ Portrait of Passion
N'otu afọ ahụ, e tinyere ya na ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Vivian Ejike's Private Storm  nke gunyere Omotola Jalade Ekeinde na Ramsey Nouah
A kọwapụtara Blossom na ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Africa Magic, Jara,  dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ise aga akacha lekwasị anya na 2013

Ọ bụ onye nke anọ na ndetu ọnụ ọgụgụ ace nke onye nduzie nke Nollywood bụ Charles Novia nke ndị kacha eme ihe nkiri nke 2013,  Na 2012 Chukwujekwu nwetara ọrụ na Flower Girl  nke bụ ya ihe nkiri bipụtara ya
Ewepụtara ya na 2013,  ọ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma dị egwu na azụmahịa na Nigeria, Ghana, United Kingdom na mmemme ihe nkiri na United States na Canada
Ihe nkiri ọzọ ya na-abawa igwe nke Chukwujekwu na-esote bụ  Finding Mercy,  bụ otu n'ime ihe nkiri a tụrụ anya  na nke gara nke ọma na 2013
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri mmechi na African International Film Festival (AFRIFF 2013)
Na 2014 Knocking na Heaven's Door  pụtara na sinima na gburugburu mba na Eprel 18
Ihe omume ngosipụta agwa Chukwujekwu dị ka "Moses" bụ onye mkparị na mmetụta mmuọ uche mere ka ọ nweta ihe nrite nke Africa Magic Viewers' Choice 2015, dị ka omee n'enye ezi nkwado n'ọrụ

Nweta Nchawapụ na ihe ịga nke ọma ihe nkiri a ma ama nke Blossom gụnyere Flower Girl (2013), (2013)  nke ndi nsonye gụnyere Rita Dominic, Knocking on Heaven's Door (2014)  gunyere Majid Michel, The Visit  (2015) gunyere Nse Ikpe-Etim, A place Called Happy (2015)  na Ghana Must Go  (2016) nke Yvonne Okoro Sonyere
O gosila na ihe nkiri TV dị ole na ole na usoro ihe, dị ka Tinsel na MNET, ebe ọ n'egosiputa dị ka Mr
Akinlolu Hart, MTVBASE's HIV akpọrọ Shuga,  CATWALQ nke Emem Isong na Monalisa Chinda, Greg Odutayo's My Mum and I, About to Wed and Married
Chukwujekwu na-arụ ọrụ ndu n'egosiputa dị ka Kelechi Pepple na telenovela mbụ nke Naijiria bụ Taste of love  (2015)
Blossom Chukwujekwu lụrụ  nwunye ya bụ   Maureen n'ụzọ omenala, na 19 Disemba 2015 wee kewapụ  na'alum di na nwunye na Septemba 2019.
